column4: can somebody walk me through getting 3d acceleration working on my ati radeon 9250?
rob I've already followed those steps
I get 350s in non full screen
did you follow the Hoary Hedgehog instructions?
have you tried sudo depmod -a ; sudo modprobe fglrx
or alternatively you can just do "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" and select fglrx
